domino_project

Class BoardSolo1

  • java.lang.Object
    • domino_project.Board
      • domino_project.BoardSolo1

  • public class BoardSolo1
extends Board
    This class represents the board of Solo1 type of DominoGame. The board consists of a PanelOfTiles from where the Tiles are given to the player and of a DominoLine on where the player puts their Tiles(from extending Board).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class domino_project.Board

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkVictory()
      Checks whether we have a victory or not.If the panel is empty we have victory,otherwise we don't.
      boolean continuePlaying()
      This method checks whether a player can continue playing this game or not.
      PanelOfTiles getPanel()
      Returns the PanelOfTiles of this board.
      void putFromPanelToEndOFLine(int x, boolean reverse)
      * This method removes the tile of a specified(x) row of the PanelOfTiles of this board and puts it at the End of the DominoLine of this board.Tile gets reversed if needed.
      void putFromPanelToStartOFLine(int x, boolean reverse)
      This method removes the tile of a specified(x) row of the PanelOfTiles of this board and puts it on the Beggining of the DominoLine of this board.Tile gets reversed if needed.

    • Method Detail

      • putFromPanelToEndOFLine

        public void putFromPanelToEndOFLine(int x,
                                    boolean reverse)
        * This method removes the tile of a specified(x) row of the PanelOfTiles of this board and puts it at the End of the DominoLine of this board.Tile gets reversed if needed.
        Parameters:
        x - the row(in PanelOfTiles) of which to get the Tile
        reverse - a boolean representing if tile needs to be reversed(true) or not(false) to be put on the DominoLine

      • putFromPanelToStartOFLine

        public void putFromPanelToStartOFLine(int x,
                                      boolean reverse)
        This method removes the tile of a specified(x) row of the PanelOfTiles of this board and puts it on the Beggining of the DominoLine of this board.Tile gets reversed if needed.
        Parameters:
        x - the row(in PanelOfTiles) of which to get the Tile
        reverse - a boolean representing if tile needs to be reversed(true) or not(false) to be put on the DominoLine

      • continuePlaying

        public boolean continuePlaying()
        This method checks whether a player can continue playing this game or not. If any of the Last Tiles of any existing row of the PanelOfTiles of this board fits on line, they can continue playing.
        Returns:
        true if continue-playing is possible,otherwise false

      • checkVictory

        public boolean checkVictory()
        Checks whether we have a victory or not.If the panel is empty we have victory,otherwise we don't.
        Returns:
        true if panel has no elements ,otherwise false.

      • getPanel

        public PanelOfTiles getPanel()
        Returns the PanelOfTiles of this board.
        Returns:
        a PanelOfTiles of this board.
